message.content:
There is a popular quote that states, "The only constant in life is change." This phrase emphasizes the idea that change is an ever-present factor in our lives, and we must learn to accept and adapt to it in order to grow and evolve.

In simpler terms, it means that nothing stays the same forever. Everything evolves, grows or decays constantly; so instead of resisting changes or fearing them, one must learn how to deal with this perpetual transformation effectively.
